design.paragraf1: We design and develop the kinds of applications, games and websites that we love to use ... beautiful, unique, fast, creative, and intuitive. Our applications instantly create a sense of excitement and anticipation. Over time they create a sense of confidence and security.
design.paragraf2: Instead of simply replicating designs that already exist, we design and build unique, alternative user experiences according to an application’s audience and needs. It is our work and our passion to see the vision of each application we develop and make that a reality.
design.paragraf3: At Puente, we’ve created an environment where people come first, where we celebrate the freedom to try new things and think differently., That environment has birthed passion and creativity, and that is what you will experience when you work with us.

software.paragraf1: We love engineering, we love learning and we love creating.  The code we write is as beautiful as the user interfaces we design.  We use the latest libraries and technologies and we write software that can be trusted ... fast, secure, stable.
software.paragraf2: At Puente, there is no limit to what we can build: applications, web, mobile, Internet of Things, games, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, embedded systems, data mining … If we haven’t done it yet, we will soon, because we specialize in understanding and implementing new ideas.
software.paragraf3: We bring ideas to life.  We develop elegant solutions to complex problems through innovation and proper assessment.

aboutus.paragraf1: Puente is a vision focused on human development. Puente employees love their job even when faced with difficult tasks and situations, because through those tasks and situations they are developing into mature artists and/or engineers.
aboutus.paragraf2: At Puente, everyone is taught to think of their teammates before themselves. Instead of keeping track of mistakes and personal faults, we celebrate personal success. As an employee, you know that everyone else’s highest purpose is for you to grow. Because you are not competing or being compared with anyone else, you are free to excel, try new things, ask questions and even make mistakes.
aboutus.paragraf3: It is our aim to provide opportunities for whole and healthy lives, while building a bridge between the world of advancing technology and Turkey.

contact.paragraf1: No matter the current exchange rate or economic situation, we are determined to lead strongly, ambitiously and courageously, grow Puente as a company and to establish personal growth and development as the general norm in our teams.
contact.paragraf2: We stand against any commonly accepted business practices that value profit over lives.  In contrast, we believe our approach will prove to the market that people-first companies produce higher quality, longer lasting and more profitable products in the end.
